subject: Can't afford drugs you need?
body:
Dear valued member.
Good news from MyCanadianPharmacy. Spring discounts for all our customers. 
MyCanadianPharmacy on-line drug store provides quality pharmaceutical products to help you manage your health and well-being without spending heaps of money.
Click here to read more and make orderhttp://makesame.hk
Our customers appreciate the level of our service and fast delivery.
Sincerely yours,Brigitte Gregg
